document.full_text: china on tuesday pledged easier access for u.s. companies to key sectors of its economy by removing barriers to its huge market in government contracts and offering a foothold to u.s. mutual funds.
document.title: china eases trade rules, allows u.s. fund sales
lines_and_colors: china on tuesday pledged easier access for u.s. companies to key sectors of its economy by removing barriers to its huge market in government contracts and offering a foothold to u.s. mutual funds.
